meanings.definition: The act of writing or drawing hastily or carelessly.
meanings.sent1: Her scribblings on the paper were messy and hard to read.
meanings.sent2: I found some old scribblings in my notebook from when I was a child.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked across the table, leaving its scribblings behind in the spilled salt.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a jumble of scribblings, trying to make sense of the chaotic thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The artist's scribblings on the canvas captured the essence of spontaneity.

meanings.definition: A piece of writing or drawing that is done quickly or without much thought.
meanings.sent1: She crumpled up the scribblings and threw them in the trash.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked the students to share their scribblings with the class.
meanings.sent3: His scribblings on the napkin turned out to be a brilliant idea for a new invention.
meanings.sent4: The scribblings on the wall told a mysterious story of a forgotten past.
meanings.sent5: The child proudly showed off his scribblings of stick figures and smiley faces.
